comment: Do homework on MathLab. More helpful than him. He will go over problems in class but skip steps that he can do in his head. He also is extremely insulting when you ask questions - calling people dyslexic, and asking how they passed the previous classes, etc. Makes you embarrassed to ask questions. Classes are pointless.

Not sure why everyone is upset here, he was a really nice guy and his class was fairly simple. im not a math guy, but he helped me improve for sure. always there to help. takes attendance but you dont really NEED to be there. tests are straight forward. online homework is SO easy, basically gives you the answers in class. plenty of time to do also.
